title: How to Get Hallowed Armor in Terraria

steps.headline: Find the correct ores.
steps.description:
To begin, you will need lots of adamantite, mythril, and cobalt. Look below for where to find these ores:
Cobalt: Anywhere you can find metals such as iron or silver. Mythril: Somewhat deeper than gold, in the deep caverns. Adamantite: Extremely deep, directly above the underworld.

steps.headline: Make these armor combinations, assuming you can:
steps.description: Adamantite breastplate, helmet, and leggings. Mythril breastplate, helmet, and leggings. Cobalt breastplate, helmet, and leggings

steps.headline: Add all the pieces of armor together at a mythril anvil.
steps.description:
These are what to add:
Adamantite chestplate + adamantite helmet + adamantite leggings. Mythril chestplate + mythril helmet + mythril leggings. Cobalt chestplate + cobalt helmet+ cobalt leggings.

text:
Find the correct ores. To begin, you will need lots of adamantite, mythril, and cobalt. Look below for where to find these ores:
Cobalt: Anywhere you can find metals such as iron or silver. Mythril: Somewhat deeper than gold, in the deep caverns. Adamantite: Extremely deep, directly above the underworld. Make these armor combinations, assuming you can: Adamantite breastplate, helmet, and leggings. Mythril breastplate, helmet, and leggings. Cobalt breastplate, helmet, and leggings Add all the pieces of armor together at a mythril anvil. These are what to add:
Adamantite chestplate + adamantite helmet + adamantite leggings. Mythril chestplate + mythril helmet + mythril leggings. Cobalt chestplate + cobalt helmet+ cobalt leggings. Done! Now put on your armor.
